screen_desc: The screenshot is of the Google Play Store page for Spotify. It shows the app's rating, number of downloads, and a brief description. There are also suggested apps and similar apps listed below.
action_think: The Spotify app is already installed, so the user's request has been fulfilled. No further action is required.
action_result: The execution of user request is stopped.
prev_action_result: By clicking on the "Install" button, the app is now installed on your device. This action is necessary to proceed with the user request of installing Spotify.
